description: Developed as the go-to technical down for mountain adventures, and perfected over many years by seasoned mountaineers, the Broad Peak IN hooded jacket has earned its place at the core of our collection through countless miles in alpine conditions. A must-have for winter layering and summer alpine days alike, responsibly sourced 800 in³ fill power goose down provides exceptional warmth when you need it most. Fully recycled and abrasion resistant Pertex® Quantum outer material offers maximum thermal performance in a lightweight package that repels light rain and snow. Backpack and harness-compatible pockets, elasticated hood and two-way zipper will make this jacket a true workhorse for many years to come. Packing into its own pocket and weighing in at just 384 g, this is one piece of gear you won’t want to leave home without
name: Mammut Broad Peak IN Hooded Jacket - Mens
